catalog_script_client.name: Colores

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_5a5af9962f8111105ca8d2172799b64b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Issue reporting form">f0d65e652f0111105ca8d2172799b664</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:200852e52f0111105ca8d2172799b669</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Colores</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if ( newValue == '') {
      return;
    }
    
    var colores = g_form.getValue('color_favorito');
    
    // Clear all of the choices from the What needed field choice list
    g_form.clearOptions('color_favorito');
    
    // If the value of the Request type field is hr, add
    // two hr choices and other to the What needed field choice list
    if(newValue == 'rojo'){
      g_form.addOption('color_favorito','rojo','Rojo');
     
    }
    // If the value of the Request type field is facilities, add
    // two facilities choices and other to the What needed field
    // choice list
    if(newValue == 'azul'){
      g_form.addOption('color_favorito','azul','Azul');
      
    }
    // If the value of the Request type field is legal, add
    // two legal choices and other to the What needed field
    // choice list
    if(newValue == 'amarillo'){
     g_form.addOption('color_favorito','amarillo','Amarillo');
      g_form.addOption('color_favorito','other','Other');
    }
    
    // If the form is loading and it is not a new record, set the u_what_needed value to the
    // value from the record before it was loaded
    if(isLoading && !g_form.isNewRecord()){
      g_form.setValue('color_favorito', colores);
    }
  }]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-03 17:42:35</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5a5af9962f8111105ca8d2172799b64b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Colores</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Printer" source="x_857394_printer">41b65e612f0111105ca8d2172799b6aa</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Printer">41b65e612f0111105ca8d2172799b6aa</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5a5af9962f8111105ca8d2172799b64b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-03 17:46:02</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
